backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of main frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for Home, About, Courses, and Contact using SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with branding, quick links, contact info, and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Reusable section wrapper providing spacing and container layout.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout combining Header, routed content, and Footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing authenticated or anonymous backend actors via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing identity loading, login, and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, and base typography and layout styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a cn helper that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutTeacherPage.tsx: Renders the teacher bio page with hero content, background info, and focus areas using cards and sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact page with contact info cards and a form that triggers a mailto link on submit.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Displays course offerings with icons, features, and CTA links, organized into cards and sections.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage hero, key offerings, and CTAs using responsive sections and UI cards.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, OKLCH variables, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements for a simple educational website for Manthan Academy, including features, pages, and image needs. Contains versioning, feature list, and project summary details.
